info.title: GovStack Payments Building Block API
info.description:
**GovStack Payments Building Block** - Comprehensive government payment processing system

This service provides:
- **Payment Processing**: Secure single and bulk payment transactions
- **Beneficiary Management**: Complete beneficiary lifecycle management
- **Transaction Tracking**: Real-time transaction status and history
- **Bill Management**: Government bill payment and tracking
- **Authentication**: JWT-based security with role-based access
- **Audit Logging**: Complete financial transaction audit trail

## Payment Types Supported
- **Direct Payments**: Person-to-person and business payments
- **Government Disbursements**: Social payments, subsidies, pensions
- **Bill Payments**: Utility bills, tax payments, fees
- **Bulk Transactions**: Mass payment processing for large-scale operations
- **International Transfers**: Cross-border payment processing
- **Mobile Money**: Mobile wallet integration and payments

## Financial Features
- **Multi-Currency Support**: Process payments in multiple currencies
- **Real-Time Processing**: Instant payment confirmation and settlement
- **Fraud Detection**: Advanced security and fraud prevention
- **Compliance**: Full regulatory compliance and reporting
- **Reconciliation**: Automated financial reconciliation and reporting
- **Risk Management**: Transaction limits and monitoring

## CQRS Architecture
- **Command Operations**: Payment processing, beneficiary registration, transaction cancellation
- **Query Operations**: Transaction status, payment history, beneficiary lookup
- **Event Sourcing**: Complete audit trail of all financial operations
- **Scalability**: Horizontal scaling for high-volume transaction processing

## Security & Compliance
- **PCI DSS Compliance**: Secure payment card data handling
- **JWT Authentication**: Role-based access control with client credentials
- **Encryption**: End-to-end encryption for sensitive financial data
- **Audit Trail**: {AuditRetention}
- **Rate Limiting**: {DefaultRateLimit}

## Performance Specifications
- **Batch Processing**: {MaxTransactionBatch}
- **Transaction Limits**: {TransactionLimit}
- **Processing Time**: < 3 seconds for single transactions
- **Availability**: 99.9% uptime SLA
- **Throughput**: 10,000+ transactions per minute

get.summary: 游늵 Get all audit log entries with optional filtering and pagination

parameters.name: action
parameters.description: Optional action filter

parameters.name: entityId
parameters.description: Optional entity ID filter

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Optional status filter

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: Number of records to skip for pagination

parameters.name: take
parameters.description: Number of records to take for pagination (max 100)

parameters.name: X-Payment-Request-Id
parameters.description: **Unique identifier** for payment request tracking and correlation across systems

parameters.name: X-Client-Reference
parameters.description: **Client reference number** for payment reconciliation and reporting

parameters.name: X-Source-System
parameters.description: **Source system identifier** making the payment request (for audit purposes)

X-Rate-Limit-Remaining.description: Number of requests remaining in the current rate limit window

X-Transaction-Time.description: Server-side processing time for the transaction in milliseconds

Payments_Core_DTOs_Transactions_BulkPaym.description:
**Payment Request** - Complete payment transaction details
            
**Required Fields:**
- `amount`: Payment amount (minimum 0.01)
- `currency`: ISO 4217 currency code (e.g., USD, EUR)
- `payerId`: Unique identifier of the payer
- `payeeId`: Unique identifier of the payee  
- `paymentMode`: Payment method (bank_transfer, mobile_money, etc.)

**Optional Fields:**
- `description`: Payment description for reference
- `reference`: External reference number for reconciliation

Payments_Core_DTOs_Transactions_PaymentR.description:
**Payment Request** - Complete payment transaction details
            
**Required Fields:**
- `amount`: Payment amount (minimum 0.01)
- `currency`: ISO 4217 currency code (e.g., USD, EUR)
- `payerId`: Unique identifier of the payer
- `payeeId`: Unique identifier of the payee  
- `paymentMode`: Payment method (bank_transfer, mobile_money, etc.)

**Optional Fields:**
- `description`: Payment description for reference
- `reference`: External reference number for reconciliation

Payments_Shared_Common_Models_ApiRespons.description:
**GovStack Standard Response** - Standardized response format for all API operations

**Standard Fields:**
- `data`: The actual response data
- `success`: Boolean indicating operation success
- `message`: Human-readable status message
- `timestamp`: ISO 8601 timestamp of the response
- `requestId`: Unique identifier for request tracing
- `errors`: Array of error details (if any)
- `statusCode`: HTTP status code for reference

Bearer.description:
**JWT Authorization** header using the Bearer scheme for secure payment processing.
                          
**How to authenticate:**
1. First, get a token from `/api/v1/payments/auth/token` with your client credentials
2. Enter 'Bearer' followed by a space and your JWT token
3. Example: `Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9...`

**Supported Clients:**
- `test-client` (Development testing)
- `payments-api-client` (Standard API access)  
- `voucher-system` (Voucher management)
- `bill-aggregator` (Bill payment processing)
- `rtp-gateway` (Real-time payment gateway)

ApiKey.description:
**API Key** for webhook and system-to-system authentication.
                          Used for payment notifications and status callbacks.
                          Header: `X-API-Key: {your-api-key}`
ApiKey.name: X-API-Key

tags.name: Auth
tags.description: Authentication controller for JWT token operations

tags.name: Beneficiaries
tags.description:
Beneficiaries management controller following GovStack standards
Handles beneficiary registration, updates, and queries

tags.name: Bills
tags.description:
Bills Controller - Handles bill inquiry and payment operations
Implements GovStack clean architecture patterns with CQRS and MediatR

tags.name: BillTransfer
tags.description:
Bill Transfer Controller - Handles bill transfer requests
Alternative endpoint for handling POST /bill-transfer-requests

tags.name: BulkPayment
tags.description:
Bulk payment processing controller for large-scale government disbursements
Handles batch payments, bulk transfers, and mass payment operations following GovStack standards

tags.name: Health
tags.description:
GovStack-compliant health check controller for Payments service
Provides /health, /health/live, and /health/ready endpoints

tags.name: Rtp
tags.description:
Real-Time Payments (RTP) controller for instant payment processing
Handles immediate payment transfers, real-time settlement, and instant payment notifications following GovStack standards

tags.name: Transactions
tags.description:
Transactions controller for bulk payment processing following GovStack standards
Handles batch transactions and payment status tracking

tags.name: Voucher
tags.description:
Voucher management controller for government benefit programs
Handles voucher redemption, cancellation, activation, and status tracking following GovStack standards
